Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Hmm, I believe the tea is ready.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line2: How could a meal look so pathetic every time I glance at it?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I shall definitely report you to the highest manager!

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I must apologize for my incompetence, sir.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: Don't you dare appear in my sight again!
